  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030702</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030702</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Las vacunas</string>
            <string language="en">Vaccines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Impfstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vaccins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vacinas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vaccini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμβόλια</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Actividad de investigación sobre las vacunas. El alumno deberá realizar un informe y responder a una serie de preguntas, utilizando como fuente de información las direcciones recomendadas. Además elaborará una tabla de datos y una presentación digital.</string>
            <string language="en">Research activity on vaccines. The students must write a report and answer a series of questions using as information sources the recommended addresses. They must also construct a data table and a digital presentation..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vacunas</string>
            <string language="en">vaccines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung Aktivität auf Impfstoffen. Die 
Kursteilnehmer müssen einen Report schreiben und eine Reihe Fragen 
mit als Informationsquellen den empfohlenen Adressen beantworten. 
Sie müssen eine Datentabelle und eine digitale Darstellung auch
konstruieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité de recherches sur des vaccins. 
Les étudiants doivent écrire un état et répondre à une 
série de questions en utilisant comme émetteurs d'informations les 
adresses recommandées. Ils doivent également construire une 
table de données et une présentation digitale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade da pesquisa em vacinas. Os 
estudantes devem escrever um relatório e responder a uma série das 
perguntas usando como fontes de informação os endereços 
recomendados. Devem também construir uma tabela dos dados e uma
apresentação digital.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività di ricerca sui vaccini. Gli 
allievi devono scrivere un rapporto e rispondere ad una serie di 
domande usando come sorgenti di informazioni gli indirizzi suggeriti. 
Devono anche costruire una tabella di dati e una presentazione 
digitale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνητική δραστηριότητα στα εμβόλια. Οι 
σπουδαστές πρέπει να γράψουν μια έκθεση και να απαντήσουν σε μια 
σειρά ερωτήσεων χρησιμοποιώντας ως πηγές πληροφοριών τις 
συνιστώμενες διευθύνσεις. Πρέπει επίσης να κατασκευάσουν 
έναν πίνακα στοιχείων και μια ψηφιακή παρουσίαση ..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Impfstoffe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vaccins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vacinas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
